meanings.definition: relating to or consisting of visual images or designs
meanings.sent1: The book had a graphical cover with colorful pictures.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the graphical presentation of the data on the screen.
meanings.sent3: The graphical patterns on the wallpaper made the room look lively.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and graphical as a rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The graphical illustrations in the textbook helped students understand the concepts better.

meanings.definition: represented or displayed in a graphical form
meanings.sent1: The graphical representation of the map made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The software provided a graphical interface for users to interact with.
meanings.sent3: The graphical depiction of the story added a fun element to the presentation.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like a graphical chart, easy to read and interpret.
meanings.sent5: The graphical diagram showed the relationship between different variables clearly.
